sn20.2:1.2: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn20.2:1.4: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yo cāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito yā cāyaṁ mahāpathavī”ti?
sn20.2:1.6: Appamattakoyaṁ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito.
sn20.2:1.7: Saṅkhampi na upeti upanidhimpi na upeti kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṁ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito”ti.
sn20.2:1.8: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
sn20.2:1.9: atha kho eteyeva bahutarā sattā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
